clean

clean.py - Data cleaning module for Grad Cafe applicant data.

This module provides functions to clean and standardize scraped data, removing HTML remnants and ensuring consistent formatting.

src.module_2.clean.clean_data(raw_data)[source]

Clean and standardize scraped applicant data.

Parameters:

raw_data – List of raw applicant dictionaries

Returns:

List of cleaned applicant dictionaries

src.module_2.clean.load_data(filename)[source]

Load data from a JSON file.

Parameters:

filename – Input filename

Returns:

List of applicant dictionaries

src.module_2.clean.save_data(data, filename)[source]

Save data to a JSON file.

Parameters:

  • data – List of applicant dictionaries

  • filename – Output filename
